General.Name: Jiangsu Jiejie Microelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu JieJie Microelectronics Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and markets semiconductor discrete components and power electronic devices in China and internationally. It offers thyristor wafers, including TRIACS and SCRS; and protective device wafers, such as TVS, discharge tube, ESD, integrated discharge tube, chip Y capacitor, varistor, etc. The company also provides power modules and subassemblies; MOSFET; silicon carbide devices; power management IC; IGBT; optocoupler; rectifier; and small signal devices. Its products are used in fast charger, charging station, switching power supply, motor driving, photovoltaic inverter, white goods, leakage protective devices, automotive electronics, consumer electronics, and battery management system. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Qidong, China.
